hero.title: About UnlockIT
hero.subtitle: We're passionate about making AI and IT education accessible to everyone. Our mission is to empower beginners with the knowledge and skills they need to succeed in the tech industry.

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.description1: At UnlockIT, we believe that technology should be accessible to everyone, regardless of their background or experience level. We're dedicated to breaking down the barriers that prevent people from entering the exciting world of AI and IT.
mission.description2: Through our carefully crafted courses, expert instruction, and supportive community, we help beginners build confidence and develop practical skills that translate directly to real-world success.

values.title: Our Values
values.subtitle: The principles that guide everything we do

quality.title: Quality Education
quality.description: We maintain the highest standards in our curriculum, ensuring every lesson is comprehensive, up-to-date, and industry-relevant.

community.title: Supportive Community
community.description: Learning is better together. We foster a welcoming environment where students can learn from each other and grow together.

innovation.title: Continuous Innovation
innovation.description: Technology evolves rapidly, and so do we. We constantly update our content and methods to stay ahead of industry trends.

story.title: Our Story
story.paragraph1: UnlockIT was founded with a simple yet powerful vision: to make advanced technology education accessible to everyone. Our founder, Michał Wroński, recognized that while AI and IT were transforming every industry, quality education in these fields remained out of reach for many people.
story.paragraph2: Starting with a small group of dedicated students, we've grown into a thriving community of learners and professionals. Our hands-on approach, combined with expert instruction and real-world projects, has helped hundreds of students successfully transition into tech careers.
story.paragraph3: Today, we continue to innovate and expand our offerings, always staying true to our core mission: unlocking the potential of every student who walks through our doors.

cta.title: Ready to Start Your Journey?
cta.subtitle: Join our community of learners and take the first step towards your tech career.

hero.title: Meet Our Instructors
hero.subtitle: Learn from industry experts who are passionate about teaching and dedicated to your success.

michal.bio1: With over 15 years of experience in the IT industry, Michał has worked on projects ranging from startup MVPs to enterprise-scale systems. His passion for teaching and mentoring has helped hundreds of students successfully transition into tech careers.
michal.bio2: Michał believes in practical, hands-on learning combined with solid theoretical foundations. His teaching philosophy centers on making complex concepts accessible and immediately applicable to real-world scenarios.

practical.title: Practical Learning
practical.description: Every concept is taught through real-world examples and hands-on projects that students can add to their portfolios.

personalized.title: Personalized Approach
personalized.description: We recognize that every student learns differently and adapt our teaching methods to individual needs and learning styles.

industry.title: Industry-Relevant
industry.description: Our curriculum is constantly updated to reflect current industry trends and the skills that employers are actually looking for.

joinTeam.title: Ready to Learn from the Best?
joinTeam.subtitle: Join our community and start learning from experienced professionals who care about your success.

hero.title: AI Fundamentals
hero.subtitle: Master the basics of Artificial Intelligence and Machine Learning. Perfect for beginners who want to understand AI and start building their first AI projects.

overview.title: What You'll Learn
overview.description: This comprehensive course covers everything you need to know to get started with AI and machine learning.

foundation.title: Strong Foundation
foundation.description: Build a solid understanding of AI concepts, terminology, and mathematical foundations.

practical.title: Hands-On Projects
practical.description: Apply your knowledge through guided projects using real datasets and industry-standard tools.

mentorship.title: Expert Mentorship
mentorship.description: Get guidance from experienced AI professionals throughout your learning journey.

curriculum.title: Course Curriculum
curriculum.subtitle: 8 weeks of structured learning with practical projects

module1.title: Introduction to AI & Machine Learning
module1.description: Understanding what AI is, its applications, and the different types of machine learning.

module2.title: Data and Algorithms
module2.description: Learn about data preparation, basic algorithms, and how machines learn from data.

module3.title: Practical AI Applications
module3.description: Build real AI projects and understand how to deploy and use AI in practical scenarios.

instructor.title: Your Instructor
instructor.bio: Michał brings 15+ years of experience in software development and AI implementation. He has worked with startups and Fortune 500 companies to implement AI solutions.

enrollment.title: Ready to Start Your AI Journey?
enrollment.subtitle: Join hundreds of students who have successfully learned AI fundamentals with us.
enrollment.note: 30-day money-back guarantee • Lifetime access • Certificate of completion
